name: 2024 8th International Conference on Information Technology and Internet of Things
content: PUBLICATION: ✿ Conference Proceedings Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted paper will be published in International Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted to major databases like Scopus, Ei Compendex, etc for abstracting and indexing. ✿ Journal A shortlist of extended papers from ITIOT2024 will be recommended to IJFCC editorial board for further review, and accepted papers will be published into in the International Journal of Future Computer and Communication in regular issues, which will be indexed by Crossref, Electronic Journals Library, INSPEC (IET), Google Scholar, EBSCO, etc.
